title: Cross-Network Transaction Hash Misbinding
primary_reason: Network mismatch between the invoice and the submitted transaction.

title: Token Decimal Misinterpretation (6 vs 18)
primary_reason: The transferred base unit amount does not satisfy the expected invoice amount.

title: Token Spoofing with Identical Symbol
primary_reason: Token spoofing detected due to an unapproved token contract.

title: Wrong Recipient but Correct Amount
primary_reason: Wrong recipient address detected in the transaction.

title: Webhook Replay via Reused Nonce
primary_reason: Replay security risk detected due to a reused webhook nonce.

title: RPC Timeout Misclassified as Payment Failure
primary_reason: RPC uncertainty and missing chain data require pending status.

title: Conflicting RPC Views of Confirmation Height
primary_reason: RPC disagreement on confirmation height prevents safe settlement.

title: Post-Confirmation Reorg Double Spend
primary_reason: Chain reorg invalidated the transaction leading to a double spend security risk.

title: Concurrent Attach Race on Same Transaction
primary_reason: A race condition security risk detected while attaching the transaction.

title: Production Invoice Settled by Testnet Payment
primary_reason: Network mismatch due to a testnet payment used for a production invoice.

title: Null Receipt Interpreted as Success
primary_reason: Null receipt means insufficient and uncertain confirmed on-chain proof.

title: Approval Transaction Misread as Payment
primary_reason: The transaction is merely a token approval and contains no valid payment transfer.

title: Bitcoin Change Output Misattribution
primary_reason: Wrong recipient detected since the output matches a change address, not the merchant.

title: Invoice Expiry Boundary Race
primary_reason: Transaction confirmed after expiry deadline and requires explicit cutoff policy rejection.

title: Unconfirmed Payment Treated as Final
primary_reason: Unconfirmed or mempool-only transactions require pending status until finalized.

title: Manual Override vs Auto-Confirmation Race
primary_reason: Concurrent status updates must remain pending to prevent inconsistent ledger state.

title: Idempotency Key Reuse Across Different Amounts
primary_reason: A spoofing or replay security risk detected through idempotency key reuse with mismatched payloads.

title: Multiple Transfers in One Transaction Overcount
primary_reason: The transaction contains invalid unrelated transfer legs that must be excluded to prevent overcounting.

title: Byzantine RPC Provider Data Poisoning
primary_reason: RPC disagreement and uncertainty due to conflicting node responses.

title: Cross-Tenant Webhook Endpoint Confusion
primary_reason: Cross-tenant security risk detected for the webhook destination.
